DESC.PARA: An emission spectrum from hot diffuse gas based on the model calculations of Mewe and Gronenschild (as amended by Kaastra). The model includes line emissions from several elements.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: metal abundances (He fixed at cosmic). The elements included are C, N, O, Ne, Na, Mg, Al, Si, S, Ar, Ca, Fe, Ni. Abundances are set by the set_xsabund command.
10^-14 / (4 pi (D_A*(1+z))^2) Int n_e n_H dV, where D_A is the angular size distance to the source (cm), n_e is the electron density (cm^-3), and n_H is the hydrogen density (cm^-3)

DESC.PARA: The references for this model are:

LIST.ITEM: Mewe, R., Gronenschild, E.H.B.M., and van den Oord, G.H.J. 1985, A&AS, 62, 197
Mewe, R., Lemen, J.R., and van den Oord, G.H.J. 1986, A&AS, 65, 511
Kaastra, J.S. 1992, An X-Ray Spectral Code for Optically Thin Plasmas (Internal SRON-Leiden Report, updated version 2.0)

DESC.PARA: Similar credit may also be given for the adopted ionization balance:

LIST.ITEM: Arnaud, M., and Rothenflug, M. 1985, A&AS, 60, 425
Arnaud, M., and Raymond, J, 1992, ApJ, 398, 394

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.
